title: Build CareerSphere career guidance platform with 8 interactive modules

requirements.text: Create a landing page with hero section displaying title 'CareerSphere' and tagline 'Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge', navigation menu with links to Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login, and a prominent 'Get Started' call-to-action button

quotes: Tagline: Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge
Navigation menu: Home, Modules, About, Contact, Login

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'CareerSphere' as the main title
Tagline 'Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge' is visible below the title
Navigation menu contains Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login links
'Get Started' button is prominently displayed and clickable

requirements.text: Create a modules section displaying 8 interactive feature cards in a grid layout: Career Path Suggestion App, India vs Abroad Career Decision Guide, Stream Selector Tool for 10th Students, Know Your Skill AI Chatbot, FutureMap Visual Career Journey, Regional Language Career Platform, Subject-to-Career AR Explorer, and Degree Info Finder (After 12th). Each card must include an icon, short description, and 'Explore' button

quotes: Each card should have icon, short description, and "Explore" button

acceptanceCriteria: All 8 module cards are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each card displays a relevant icon, descriptive text, and 'Explore' button
Cards are interactive and visually distinct
Explore buttons link to respective module pages

requirements.text: Create a Career Path page with a dropdown selector for subjects/interests that displays career options, required degrees, and relevant entrance exams in a card-based layout

quotes: Show career options, degrees, and exams in cards format

acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown menu allows users to select from multiple subjects/interests
Career options are displayed as cards after selection
Each career card shows related degrees and entrance exams
Layout is responsive and organized

requirements.text: Create a Stream Selector Quiz page with multiple choice questions that provides a result section displaying the suggested stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts) based on user answers

quotes: Result section showing suggested stream (Science / Commerce / Arts)

acceptanceCriteria: Quiz displays multiple choice questions one at a time or in a sequence
Users can select answers and navigate through questions
Result page shows recommended stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts)
Result is based on user's quiz responses

requirements.text: Create an India vs Abroad Comparison page featuring a comparison table with columns for Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, and Job Opportunities, enhanced with graphs or visual indicators

quotes: Comparison table: Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, Job Opportunities

acceptanceCriteria: Comparison table displays India vs Abroad data across Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, and Job Opportunities
Visual indicators or graphs enhance data presentation
Information is clear and easy to compare
Layout is responsive on mobile devices

requirements.text: Create a Chatbot page with a chat interface layout including message display area, message input box, and send button, designed with a student-friendly aesthetic

quotes: Message input box and send button

acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface displays conversation messages in a scrollable area
Message input box allows text entry
Send button submits user messages
Design is welcoming and appropriate for students

requirements.text: Create a FutureMap page displaying a visual career journey flow from School Subjects → Degree → Career → Job using a timeline or roadmap-style UI

quotes: Visual step flow: School Subjects → Degree → Career → Job

acceptanceCriteria: Visual flow shows progression from School Subjects to Degree to Career to Job
Timeline or roadmap design makes the journey clear and intuitive
Each stage is visually distinct and connected
Layout works on both desktop and mobile

requirements.text: Create a Degree Info Finder page with a search bar that displays degree information cards showing degree name, duration, entrance exams, and fees

quotes: Cards showing degree name, duration, exams, fees

acceptanceCriteria: Search bar allows users to search for degrees
Search results display as cards with degree name, duration, entrance exams, and fees
Cards are well-organized and easy to read
Search functionality filters results appropriately

requirements.text: Create an About section describing the CareerSphere platform, including the problem statement that students lack career guidance, along with the platform's mission and vision

quotes: Problem statement: Students lack career guidance

acceptanceCriteria: About section includes a description of the CareerSphere platform
Problem statement clearly states that students lack career guidance
Mission and vision statements are displayed
Content is well-formatted and readable

requirements.text: Create a Contact page with a contact form containing fields for name, email, and message, and include a footer with social media links

quotes: Contact form with name, email, message

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form displays fields for name, email, and message
Form includes a submit button
Footer contains social media links
Form validation ensures required fields are completed

requirements.text: Implement a modern UI design system with soft gradient colors (blue and purple), fully responsive mobile-friendly layouts, clean typography, dashboard-style components using cards, icons, and interactive buttons throughout the application

quotes: Modern UI with soft colors (blue, purple, gradient)
Use cards, icons, and interactive buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses soft blue and purple gradients consistently
All pages are fully responsive and work on mobile devices
Typography is clean and readable
Dashboard-style components are used throughout
Cards, icons, and buttons are interactive and visually consistent

nonGoals: Backend AI functionality for the chatbot (UI only)
Actual AR implementation for Subject-to-Career AR Explorer (card placeholder only)
Multi-language support for Regional Language Career Platform (card placeholder only)
User authentication system implementation (Login link is UI only)
Database integration for storing user quiz results or form submissions
